suggestions.title: Family Game Night
suggestions.description: An evening filled with board games, snacks, and fun competition.
suggestions.reasoning: A cozy game night offers fun and bonding without the need to travel.

suggestions.title: Winter Hiking Adventure
suggestions.description: Explore the winter trails at Frosty National Park and enjoy the beautiful scenery.
suggestions.reasoning: A winter hike would be refreshing and a great way to enjoy the season together.

suggestions.title: Cooking Class for Families
suggestions.description: Join a local cooking class to learn and create delicious winter recipes together.
suggestions.reasoning: Cooking together can be a fun and educational experience for the family.
